data.title: Getting Paid Faster with Luke Smith and Chris Barton from NZ Xero
data.meta_description: Join Luke Smith and Chris Barton from NZ Xero, as they share insights into the use of online invoices, payment services and the benefits of e-invoicing.
data.text:
Cash flow is the lifeblood of any small business and Xero’s research also shows that it’s one of the top pain points, along with time. There are some key steps small businesses can take to help improve their cash flow and ensure they receive money they are owed on time.

Join Luke Smith, Director of Operations and Chris Barton, Financial Partnerships for Xero NZ, as they share insights into the use of online invoices, payment services and the benefits of e-invoicing.
